title: Like a cross between Animal House (without the extreme crudeness) and Dead Poet Society
review:
I don't remember what path led us to this film except that when we saw Steven Spielberg quoted as loving it we added it to our list.

Enthusiasm waned when we saw the description which sounded like Animal House. A 3 hour long Animal House.

But then we saw it was the highest grossing Indian movie ever when it came out. Courage returned.

Then we saw the movie poster. And we really wondered what we were letting ourselves in for. Coming across Big in Bollywood, a documentary following the American-born Indian cast member, bolstered Tom and Rose's courage. I hadn't seen it but went along for the 3 Idiots ride.

It was something like a cross between Animal House (without the extreme crudeness) and Dead Poet Society. With some song and dance numbers thrown in because it is Bollywood, so of course. And it was surprisingly charming a lot of the time. Uneven but we weren't sorry we watched it. We didn't expect it to tackle very serious themes (that's the Dead Poet Society part) but it was done quite sensitively.

Overall enjoyable as long as you are willing to go along for the ride. And the dance number with the umbrellas is adorable.

title: Best movie in Bollywood industry so far
review:
First I thought it is comedy movie. But after watching this movie I came to understand that it is a great mixture of comedy plus suspense. This movie actually tells about the lives of the students and the difficulties they face during college and university life. i think students should clear their concepts rather than cramming because if you want success in market you should adopt thoughtful learning and the role of the teacher is also vital. Teachers should be corporative with students. In this movie, when student asked to principal to check his project but principal didn't even see his project that makes student demotivated eventually he suicide. i think this is the most harsh scene in this movie.
As a student it is our duty to promote education and we should help needy students financially so that they will also take part in development of country and its excellence. In this movie Amir Khan pay money to the poor children to start it school so these are the main points of this movie.

title: Very informative movie for a Student
review:
The main purpose of this movie is students should get independence from parents when they choose their careers. Otherwise, they will suffer in college and as well as in market. When student student learn in which he / she has interest then he/ she will surely make his / her names.
Basically, this movie reflects our Asian education system. It is a reality that if student crams in school, college or university, he/she will get high grades and positions in his/her class, it is not guaranteed that he/she also get success in market as well. A student that always wants to clear his/her concepts then it is not sure that he will get high grades but it is guaranteed that he/she will be succeed in future when they will enter in market.
The role of teachers is also very important for the building the future of their students. Teachers should cooperate with student every time. In this movie, there is a harsh scene when principal of the college does not listen to his student and as a result student suicide.

title: The Best Movie
review:
3 idiots is a Bollywood comedy movie. The most important role and main character was played by Amir Khan as Rancho. Rancho always believe in his heart and likes to study experimentally. He always tells his friends not to learn by memory(ratta), to learn by heart and experimentally.
3 idiots tells us that sometimes extra hope optimist nature may spoil career and mental growth of a person.Don't run behind the success, achieve excellence first, the success will automatically come looking for you.Be always creative in your answers, work & things you do which helps you become more capable of your own. Learning isn't just about being inside a class room and listening to teachers but its there everywhere. You just need to grab and grow with it.There are naysayers, jealous, stupid, hatred people around us. Ignore them and move on. Remember? "If you stop and throw a stone at every dog that barks, you will never reach your destination".
In 3 idiots, There are some scenes which should not shown to children and many audiences. Chatur 's speech may be funny,but seriously think about negative effects on children and uneducated people.The speech also contains explicit Hindi words, which should not be shown like this.Ragging scenes (Jahapnah! Tussi great ho!) is promoting ragging which is an serious crime but its has been seen school children and they get bad impact of it.
At last from my perspective overall movie is good and its shown our educational system. It gives a message learn for a cause and not for applause.

title: Worth Watching Movie
review: This is one of the best movies I've ever watched in my life. A true inspirational, motivational movie and must be watched by everyone especially parents, teachers and students. This movie depicts the life we all live or have lived at some point. One of the best things I like about this movie is that it gives a lot of lessons in a funny way in order to entertain people as well. However, there are many positive and negative points to be discussed. The movie revealed harsh realities of our educational system. No doubt, selecting right field is the most important factor of successful life and career. To excel in your career, one needs to be interested, confident and excited about the selected career and should believe in oneself and talent. So, instead of forcing children, parents should help them to choose the right career by taking care of their interests, skills and abilities. The movie also ensures the importance of knowledge over grades, Learning is much more important than getting good grades to excel in particular field in order to achieve success. The movie contains some adult contents which are inappropriate. This movie also promotes suicide attempt in order to get rid of troubles, hardships and pressure of education which is not a good way to get rid of difficulties of life. Overall, it is an amazing movie that has a lot of messages for the society in which we are surviving and is worth watching.

title: One of the best movies I've every watched.
review:
The cast, the crew and the story, everything is so awesome. The story attracted me so much like there is innovation, there is fun, there is drama and everything one wants to watch in his/her quality time. The student life is depicted in an excellent manner and I guess every student as well as a teacher must watch this movie for once.
Where there are pros there are cons, the movie and it's message are misinterpreted like all the students are just looking at the fun part and enjoying the student life and missing the original message the movie actually conveys. The movie showed the main actor enrolled in a university on someone else' name and he even passed out with honors, that's a big issue which can lead to these kinds of crimes in our society.

title: FUN AND ENTERTAINING WITH MEANINGFUL LESSONS
review:
The movie '3 idiots' is a masterpiece directed by Rajkumar Hirani. The movie revolves around the lives of three engineering students of Imperial college of Engineering. Rancho, who is gifted, Farhan, who possesses the passion of photography and Raju, who wants to help his poor family by getting a good corporate job. The movie tries to draw special attention to the pressure the Indian education system and the Indian society puts on students. While the engineering discipline is highly glorified by the society as depicted in the movie; disciplines such as photography are degraded.

The movie tries to depict the struggle those students face who are forced into the discipline of engineering. It is a story of almost every student in South Asia who is passionate about something in life however due to family and societal pressure cannot pursue their career choice. They, then lose the battle against the tough, impossible and cruel system and in result lose their life by committing suicide.

The movie shows the unbreakable bond of the "idiots" trio. The head of the institute, Dr Viru Sahastrabuddhe also called Virus by his students, tries to break the friendship of the trio by distancing Farhan and Raju from the rebellious Rancho as Rancho becomes a challenge for him. However, he fails to do so as Rancho helps Farhan to follow his passion and saves Raju's father from dying with the help of Pia, younger daughter of Virus.

The character of Rancho is played by the versatile actor Amir Khan who never fails to do justice to the characters he plays. Rancho is a character to amaze people through his thoughts, his ideas, his unusual ways of understanding and expressing knowledge, his innovative inventions, his passion for achieving something in life not through copying and cheating but experimenting and exploring. He builds strong emotional bond with Farhan and Raju. He encourages Farhan to give his passion of photography a chance and try to convince his father to allow him to pursue photography. On one hand, we see Rancho, who believes in understanding, simplifying knowledge, enjoying his passion for science and engineering and implementing his knowledge practically. On the other hand, we see Chatur, often called 'Silencer' by the trio, who Is obsessed with memorizing books and topping the exams. These two types of characters are portrayed in the movie to show contrast to the audience between the two different techniques that the students follow.

The way the director shot the movie is to the point. It is full of fun and lessons. All the actors played their part brilliantly and contributed to the success of the film. The audience of the movie may be anyone. Adults, kids and students particularly those who belong to engineering as they can easily relate themselves to the movie. The good thing about the movie is that it focuses on the issues which are ignored in the society. However, one negative point I noticed in the movie was that it portrayed suicides. Suicidal scenes may affect the younger audience in a negative way.

Conclusively, the lessons that can be learned from the movie are that memorizing the curriculum word to word is not the aim of education however understanding is. Topping the batch does not declare you to be successful. Additionally, the main aim of education should be understanding and to convey meaningful knowledge to the students rather than forcing and pressurizing them to follow a strict, exhausting and punishing curriculum. The movie throws light on the way teachers do injustice to their students and how the pressure that they put on students forces them to commit suicide. The movie emphasizes the need to develop passion for learning in students. Moreover, the students should be given choice to choose their career path and not forced into science and engineering disciplines just because they are thought to be the most successful career choices. Being an engineering student myself, I would rate the movie 10/10 because it perfectly shows the life of students and what they go through.

title: tells us a life learning message ,without giving depression
review: I found this movie relate able to my academic life because I'm an engineering student and this movie also revolves around different scenarios related to three engineering students. It wonderfully tells us some serious messages in a comedy genre, otherwise this movie could become a piece of depression for me. The concept in the movie that I found positive was that it conveys a message of not encouraging cramming in studies. We should be able to understand and implement concept. Another thing that I considered good in this movie is that you should always chase your subject of interest otherwise you might get a good lifestyle and job, but you will surely not be going to enjoy your profession. An issue has also been raised through this movie, that is family pressure on a student along with academic pressure. A student might be able to handle the academic pressure but when it comes to family pressure, he starts giving more focus on good grades instead of good learning. It depicts a teacher student relation but somehow in a negative way. Teacher plays the most significant role in any student's carrier. Due to teacher's behavior, a student can simply hate or love a subject. It also tells us about the awful education system, that has become a trend in our society. But the characters in this movie gives little importance to rules and regulation of university, which is a negative thing for me, because it is not possible for a student to show a careless behavior towards discipline related issues. As student should not only focus on how to become a good engineer, but also focuses to become a good human being for the society.

title: A lesson for students
review:
Basically, I learn from this movie that
1). don't plan a 'career' which we have no idea.
2). The examination system is flawed, The exams are never able to check the true potential of students.And very often, the results hurt them as they make direct comparison with fellow students.
3). It also tell we should learn with 'purpose'.Most time we don't understand the real purpose of learning , how its going to affect us and people around us.
4),Chase 'Excellence' success will follow. :)

title: The greatest Bollywood movie of all times "3 Idiots".
review:
I think this is the best movie Bollywood has ever produced. The movie got many hilarious and funny scenes. All the cast in the movie played their roles superbly, especially Amir Khan was outstanding in his role. It deals with the present education system in India as well as in Pakistan where students and teachers think that only memorizing everything is the way for success. The main theme of the movie states that we the students can excel or achieve anything in life which if he/she has interest in it.3-idiots not only entertains, but it also gives us lesson. This movie teaches us forward-thinking and give us hope and courage.
Movie contains many positive aspects of life like it said in the movie that "we should learn but first by understanding it not by memorizing it.The most positive message that was given in this movie was "to join that career which you like the most". The golden rule which 3 IDIOTS teaches us in a light and entertaining way is that "Whatever the problem in life is, just say to yourself "All is Well". This won't solve your problems, but it will give the courage to face it. "Chase Excellence and success will follow "and also "life is not about getting good grades but chasing your dreams".
But still the movie contains some negative aspects as they have showed some serious content which is effecting our society. They remembered the message of "following your heart's desire", but they forgot that only hard work and persistence are the key for success."3 Idiots" was passed with U/A ( Under Adult) certificate by Censor board. Still, there are some scenes which should not shown to children and many audiences. Attempted & Suicide scenes by the students in movie giving wrong message. Baby delivery scene was also not appropriate for children. Chatur 's speech may be funny, but it showed negative effects in children. The speech also contains explicit Hindi words, which should not be shown like this. Ragging scenes is promoting ragging in universities which is an serious crime. Kissing Scene by the actors at the end was also not appropriate for children.
But in short, this is must watch movie as it teaches great lesson for the students and also for the teachers as well. I hope everyone who will watch this movie and will enjoy it.
I am giving it 10/10.
Thanks!

title: Entertainment with a Strong Message.
review: 3 idiots is a movie that you can watch again and again. It is full of comedy and entertainment but with a very strong message for our society. In movie, there were few disrespectful scenes regarding teachers and I think this is the negative factor of this movie. There is also a learning factor for teachers that they should be careful about their behavior with students. They should think that their negative and insulting remarks make them think at extreme level.

title: All is well indeed
review:
This was, for awhile, the highest grossing movie in India. Seeing as how India makes twice as many movies as us (we're still at least in the Top 3 though), it really is something most people should watch. The basic story is that these two students are going on a road trip to find their friend, Rancho. As a three hour long comedy, it knows how to use its time. Of course, this can be said for most Bollywood films. For whatever reason, the version I saw occasionally had English in it.

What's great about this movie is that so much is going on and they know how to experiment with so many different genres. We get great comedy, drama, and romance. You could even argue it gets scary near the end. It's a plot that goes everywhere and you're having fun every minute of the day. It's one of those movies where you have to pay close attention. Nearly every joke is alluded to or referenced again in the story.

Maybe it can focus too much on drama, but working in different genres is always impressive. We even get some great lessons learned about serving our parents and how important college degrees can be. It helps that it's so much fun and we're glad to see standard Bollywood dance numbers. It's quite bright and colorful. I love the bits with the pencils in space too. Glad to know this has enough votes to be on the Top 250. ****

title: All is Well
review:
Cast: Amir Khan, Madhaan, Sharman Joshi, Karena Kapoor Khan, Omi Vaidya and Boman Irani Director: Rajkumar Hirani Synopsis: One of my favorite movie, which is funny, emotional and educational. A story of three funny best friends of an engineering college in India, whose family background was totally different from each other. Chatur "Silencer" Ramalingam give a call to his college mates Raju Rastogi and Farhan Qureshi for a reunion with Rancho after ten years of their graduation. Chatur finds a rarer picture of Rancho who was not in connection with them since their graduation day did not have any information about him. Now, Raju, Farhan, and Chatur started their journey to meet Rancho in Shimla, India. In a journey to meet Rancho, Farhan is recalling all of the memories from their first - last day of college. Their college experience was challenging in every step but also Rancho challenges his college dean Viru Sahastrabudhhe "Virus" every day.

Review: First time I have watched this movie, I think it was confusing, worthless and timewasting until I watch the movie at home with my parents. I had watched the first day, first show with my best friends and we critic whole movie worthless. We used to like action, dramatic and documentaries movies until we have watched this movie for the second time. Since then this is one of my favorite movies forever. One of the take of way from this movie was Rancho dialogue " All is well" meaning when ever you have to deal with difficulties movement in your life, forget everything, place right hand in left chest and say "All is well" to decrease your heartbeat.

One of my favorite sense from the movie is when that Chatur gives the speech in teacher day in front of the minister, principle, dean of college including teacher and students. Virus advised Farhan and Raju to be aware of Rancho and start their new life along with Chatur. Farhan ignored Virus advice but Raju thinks it was turning point for him so he started a friendship with Chatur. Now, Farhan and Rancho want to give Chatur hard time and lesson to Raju by changing scripts. Since Chatur was born in Uganda and studying in English, he Hindi was very weak. So, Farhan and Rancho take this opportunity to changed teacher day scripts using slang words in the middle of a paragraph. Now, when Chatur started speech, the whole auditorium laughs because scripts were not only funny, however, every word gives negative sense to insulting teachers and minster.

The movie contains the good quality of sounds, mixing, color contraction and animation. They have used animation of human sperms to emphasize Farhan birth and Raju critical condition in hospital. They have used silence as a sound effect in Raju sense where he jumped from the terrace committed suicide after meeting with Virus. The contrast sensitivity of Raju, Rancho, and Farhan drinking alcohol under moonlight looks pure and natural.

Finally, the title of the movie intended to be funny, but also, I viewed the movie as educational, dramatic and emotional. Every character of movie contributes a lot to be one of the best films including the director himself play a varied role including editing and writing. This is one of best movie for college students, parents, and teachers. This movie was rated 8.3 out of 10 which is pretty impressive and I think this movie deserve it.

At last rustogi says me apni life k sath kuch na kuch to acha kar he lunga which tells us to believe in ourself, not to forget that it comes from absence of fear.

A scene where subject gets electric shock while urinating, is possible only if urinated from close distance. I got to know that via one of the episodes of myth busters. Also who will take the risk? title: superb
review:
We saw a sneak preview of 3 Idiots last night at Globus Cinema in Bandra, Mumbai.

Brilliant. Simply, brilliant.

Simple but articulate story telling laced with lots of humour and lessons from life. A wonderful experience to watch as every single actor from Sharman, Madhavan, Boman, Kareena & Aamir deliver probably the best performance in a movie this year.

Sharman & Madhavan start off on a journey to seek out their friend Rancho. Together they were the 3 Idiots in college. And they take us the viewers with them on this beautiful journey with such warmth, panache, humour and love, that we don't want the journey to end.

Sharman really shows why he's one actor to watch out for. His acting genes come through in every single scene. He's perfect in his role. Sharman, you rock!I have now started finding better movies through www.flickstree.com. It not only suggests great movies to watch, it also tells where you can watch the movie online.. Highly recommended.

title: realistic movie on a engineers life
review:
"Whatever the problem in life is... just say to yourself 'Aal Izz Well'.. This wont solve your problems but it will give the courage to face it.." "Chase Excellence and success will follow".. " Life is not about getting marks, grades but chasing your dreams".. These are the golden rules which 3 IDIOTS teaches you in a very light and entertaining way.. The movie makes you laugh and in the process you learn many golden rules which can alter your life in a big manner...

3 actors from the path-breaking blockbuster RANG DE BASANTI( Aamir, Sharman, Madhvan) team up together with Rajkumar Hirani.. It couldn't get bigger! Loosely based on blockbuster novel ' Five Point Someone ' by Chetan Bhagat the movie deals with the present education system in India that whether getting more marks and better grades is better than gaining knowledge and is mugging up everything more useful than understanding it..

The movie has many hilarious scenes and everyone in the film form Aamir to Boman Irani to Omi Vaidya were superb in their roles.. Aamir has outdone himself..

title: Lovely comedy movie
review: The story of 3 idiots has been told differently and most importantly, the story offers so many twists-n-turns that you just can't guess what would unfold next.There's so much happening in every scene and the screenplay is so gripping that you don't feel the need to look at the auditorium ceiling or at your watch at brief intervals. You aren't restless. 3 idiots demonstrates how strong film-making can enhance and elevate an already solid concept. film is nothing short of an event. The supremely talented actor acts in one film a year and no two films are ever identical in terms of plot line.To sum up, 3 idiots is commercial Hindi cinema at its best. The film has 'Hit' written all over it. Let me put it this way: Cancel whatever you're doing today and go watch 3 idiots instead.Director strikes a fine balance between humor and emotions. The comic portions are executed with panache, the drama is attention-grabbing and the emotional quotient is strong enough to turn you moist-eyed. The marriage of humor and emotions as also technique and content is what drives 3 idiots to the winning post.

title: How to learn with basic values
review: My Views 3 Idiots looks at our educational system which pressurizes the students and does not allow to chose his destination by his own wish, in a satirical way and brings out some of the flaws in it... The intermission point offers a twist that is totally out of the blue and keeps you hooked to the movie ! Just when you think this feel-good comic caper is leading to its culmination, there is another surprising element at the climax which is brilliantly weaved out by Hirani.His looks and mannerisms as a college student was genuine and consummate.. Madhavan and Sharman adds up with commendable performances... Kareena does her part well... Among the supporting, Boman Irani as the eccentric head of the institution was too good.

title: College life memories
review: As the journey starts off, their college life and old memories of their friendship, with a unique free-thinker Rancho who inspired them and changed their lives, are unfolded through flashbacks and followed with some twists and turns.shots of Shimla and Ladakh are a pleasant treat for our eyes... Editing was good... Song visualizations were cool. Music was good and well placed with the flow of the narration. Coming to performances, all of them comes out with convincing portrayals, but it is Aamir Khan, the real showman of Bollywood, steals the shows with yet another stellar portrayal and will go down as one of his best performances

title: laughing & Comedy Drama
review: 3 Idiots is a 2009 Indian coming of age comedy-drama film co-written, edited, and directed by Rajkumar Hirani and produced by Vidhu Vinod Chopra. Abhijat Joshi wrote the screenplay. It was loosely adapted from the novel Five Point Someone by Chetan Bhagat. The film stars Aamir Khan, Kareena Kapoor, R. Madhavan, Sharman Joshi, Omi Vaidya, Parikshit Sahni and Boman Irani. The film is distinctive for featuring real inventions by little-known people in India's backyards. The brains behind the innovations were Remya Jose, a student from Kerala, who created the exercise- bicycle/washing-machine; Mohammad Idris, a barber from Meerut district in Uttar Pradesh, who invented a bicycle-powered horse clipper; and Jahangir Painter, a painter from Maharashtra, who made the scooter- powered flour mill.

title: must watch movie with good moral
review:
"Life is a race: If you're not fast enough, you'll get trampled," booms engineering college dean Viru Sahastrabudhhe . The stakes are high: in India 2.0, students whose parents have sacrificed everything for their education are expected to reach the top. But three brainy misfits -- Farhan, Raju and Rancho. find a common bond when they realize that their futures aren't exactly inscribed in a mathematics book.

Written and directed by Rajkumar Hirani, whose two previous films also tweaked Indian sensibilities with great commercial and critical success, "3 Idiots" has dominated at the box office holiday season. In India, the Reliance Big Pictures release collected more than 1 billion rupees in its first four days of release.

A great part of the film's appeal is Aamir Khan, who has come to specialize in heroic iconoclasts, such as a rebellious villager in "Lagaan" or a visionary teacher of special-needs kids in "Taare Zameen Par." As Rancho, a young engineer of dazzling inventiveness, Khan conveys smarts, mischief and, finally, compassion, as he spurs his friends on to greatness before he mysteriously disappears.

title: few Idiots friends always in your life
review: Most of movie has a meaning like 3 idiots movie. Once you choose the subject and start exploring about it then you must trust yourself that your decision is good and you will get success. Meanwhile you should keep noticing about what other blogger or famous blogger are doing. You can be more social @ Social Media and share about your thoughts and blogs to your friends, Family and Fans. your friends will contribute for all but few will contribute for few things . This way you can keep in touch with you friends and share as well as gain knowledge.. The comic portions are executed with panache, the drama is attention- grabbing and the emotional quotient is strong enough to turn you moist- eyed.

title: Company of 3 idiots friends
review: The film begins with the entry of our threesome in the city's elite engineering college. It takes the first tryst with the mandatory ragging sessions which enunciate who the leader of the gang is going to be: new entrant Baba Rancchoddas, as his friends fondly call him. Rancho not only leads his friends through the maze of India's competitive, high-pressure, rote-heavy, illogical and almost cruel education system, he tutors them on several life mantras too. Like, running after excellence, not success; questioning not blindly accepting givens; inventing and experimenting in lieu of copying and cramming; and essentially following your heart's calling if you truly want to make a difference.

title: we learn about education from 3 Idiots Movie
review: The engineering college, only to learn lessons of life that cannot be taught through books and classrooms. Principal Viru Sahastrabuddhe is no help at all. The film begins with the entry of our threesome in the city's elite engineering college. It takes the first tryst with the mandatory ragging sessions which enunciate who the leader of the gang is going to be: new entrant Baba Rancchoddas, as his friends fondly call him. 3 Idiots too, making it a warm and vivacious signature tune to 2009. The second half of the film does falter in parts, specially the child birth sequence, but it doesn't take long for the film to jump back on track.

title: The message of movie Believe in Your Self
review: I saw the paid premiere of 3 idiots today.On the whole, 3 idiots is a winner all the way everythingwise.3 idiots suits the term 'landmark cinema' and has all it takes to help Bollywood take a giant step into world cinema with pride.3 idiots is a sparkling example of qualitative cinema.3 idiots not only entertains, it also enlightens.3 idiots is forward-thinking, but also makes you recall your roots. It promises lots of laughs and also a heartwarming message.The comic portions are executed with panache, the drama is attention-grabbing and the emotional quotient is strong enough to turn you moist-eyed. The marriage of humor and emotions as also technique and content is what drives 3 idiots to the winning post.

title: Entertaining, Social Message, Art of Living, Creative
review:
As usual, Amir Khan once again made a very meaningful movie, named "3 Idiots". This movie being a comedy but educating real art of living a perfect life. All the instances are selected on the basis of giving a message to us that we should live our life meaningfully rather than following the trends blindly.

Though,it is difficult to count all the story. However, examples of presence of mind of the character is really appealing, e.g. producing electricity from batteries in the hour of crisis, explaining definition of a machine by rolling his pant zip. We must understand the subject rather than cramming whether it is educational or real application life.

Our life is precious. We cannot destroy it under stress just because we cannot fulfill the aspiration of other.

Missing ingredient is spirituality which must be inculcated to make a proper base for growth.

In nutshell, it's a superb, must watch movie.

title: Immensely entertaining
review:
Cast:Aamir Khan(Rancho) Madhvan(Farhan Qureshi) Sharman Joshi(Raju Rastogi) Omi Vaidya(Chatur) Boman Irani(Virus) Kareena Kapoor(Pia)

3 idiots is one of the finest movies Bollywood has ever produced.It talks about the pressures,the fun and the anxiety regarding the future of engineering students.It had been an all time blockbuster and was one of the greatest hits of 2009.

The movie begins as Farhan and get to know about their old friend Rancho who vanished after college graduation ceremony.The source of information was Chatur who always tried to be superior than other and who is eager to verify that he has become bigger success than Rancho.Farhan,Raju and Chatur all three starts their journey to find Rancho.The movie flashes back into their college days.

Farhan wanted to become a photographer but engineering is where the money is at in India.He didn't want to disappoint his parents.Raju was from a poor family.He can't afford having poor grades.Chatur was a person highly obsessed with grades and followed the motto:"There are two ways to to do well in exams,1.Study 2.Dont let anyone to study".Rancho didn't worry about getting good grades.He was passionate about engineering.Pia is trapped between choosing to keep family tradition by obeying her father for marriage or following her heart.Viru Shahastra Buddhe was the director of the college.He never liked Rancho in the college days but eventually earned Virus' coveted pen which he had received for being an exemplary student.

On the way of searching Rancho,Farhan and Raju came to know about Pia's marriage.They decide to go to venue and tell Pia about the information about Rancho.Pia decides to quit the marriage ceremony and look for Rancho.They came to know that Rancho was studying for someone else in the college.What Rancho had learned helped him establish his own line of work as an inventor and teacher later on anyway even if his achievement in the premiere engineering school had been given up to someone else. The reason behind Rancho's disappearance — which is explained halfway through the movie.

3 idiots is a smart comedy.Jokes are well written.There are few melodramatic moments but they are not overdone.The movie is entertaining throughout which keeps the viewers' attention alive.One can say that 3 idiots is one of the best movies of Bollywood.

title: The best movie from bollywood starring the best actor (Aamir khan) from bollywood. Period.
review:
Farhan Qureshi (R.Madhavan) and Raju Rastogi (Sharman Joshi) are students at the prestigious Imperial College of Engineering (ICE). Farhan's passion is wildlife photography, but he pursues an engineering degree to appease his father. Raju chooses engineering with hopes of improving his family's financial situation, but his lack of self-confidence results in poor grades. Their third roommate and friend, Ranchodas 'Rancho' Shamaldas Chanchad (Aamir Khan), has an immense interest in engineering, and invents in his spare time. After giving unorthodox answers in class, Rancho faces scrutiny from the college's director, Dr. Viru Sahastrabuddhe (Boman Irani), known as "Virus", whose traditional philosophies on education and learning contrast sharply with Rancho's atypical ideas of teaching. Virus is shown to be extremely strict — a trait that indirectly caused his own son's suicide after putting him under excessive pressure.

Rancho eventually falls in love with Pia (Kareena Kapoor), Virus' younger daughter, who is a medical student in residency at the city's hospital. He also scores the highest marks on exams out of his class, much to the dismay of both Virus and Chatur, an arrogant Tamil student who also despises Rancho. One night, Rancho, Farhan, and Raju drunkenly break into the Sahastrabuddhi household to allow Rancho to profess his love to Pia. After discovering their antics, Virus threatens to expel Raju unless he writes a letter blaming Rancho for the break-in. Unwilling to betray Rancho or disappoint his family, Raju unsuccessfully attempts suicide, and ends up in a coma. After intensive care and support from his friends, Raju recovers just before he successfully interviews for a corporate job.

Farhan has adopted Rancho's outlook and decides to pursue his love of photography. Frustrated at Rancho's influence on Raju and Farhan, Virus conspires to deliberately modify the final exams so that none of them can graduate. However, Pia gives Virus' office keys to Rancho to enable him to get the exam papers. Virus finds them and expels Rancho. The trio, however, earn a reprieve when Virus' pregnant elder daughter Mona (Mona Singh) goes into labour at the same time that a heavy storm cuts off all power and traffic. Despite this, Rancho uses his engineering knowledge to deliver the baby in the college common room. A grateful Virus finally acknowledges Rancho as an extraordinary student, and allows the three to graduate. Rancho then unexpectedly disappears shortly after the ceremony.

Ten years later, Chatur is the vice president of a corporation in the United States, Farhan is a successful photographer, and Raju is married while living a comfortable lifestyle. None of them have heard from Rancho since graduation, and the three reunite at the college campus water tower to find him. They discover that the Rancho they knew was actually "Chhote", an orphaned servant to the Chanchad family household in Shimla. When the real Ranchodas (Javed Jaffrey) went to London for four years, his father allowed the servant to fill his son's place - including using his son's full name - and take credits for the degree. With the help of the real Ranchodas, the trio travel to a village school in Ladakh, where Rancho supposedly works as a teacher. On the way there, the three rescue Pia from her arranged wedding.

title: Super movie with a lesson
review: Superb movie , lesson learned : never get down , and do not afraid with situations. Say all is well :). Also superb acting by Aamir Khan. Great movie for college students who faced stressed during studies. Also a movie for teachers to change the teaching methodology specially in India / Pakistan.And this movie contains super comedy scenes. Chatur character of this movie is a special one. And speech in a college function was awesome. Karina is not that good in movie but she still managed at least in some shots. Plot of film is like : Rancho (Aamir Khan), Raju (Sharman Joshi) and Farhan (Madhavan), three young men who met when they became roommates at the engineering faculty of Imperial College of Engineering (ICE). All three have distinguished backgrounds vary, Raju comes from a poor family who went to Facebook to get a good job to raise the degree of his family. Farhan who likes photography had majored in engineering because the order the father who thought more prestigious engineering college

title: Funny,Indian,Beautiful...a life lesson!
review: 3 idiots. Whoever hasn't watch this movie... is an idiot!Firstly, the movie talks about two friends who are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots" The film gives us the opportunity to learn what life means,to stop believing that life is a race and shows that if we want to do something,nobody can stop us from doing it!I liked some quotes from the movie like "Al is Well" or "Pursue experience and success will follow,pants down!". Moreover,it includes jokes that make the whole movie lovely and really entertaining!The actors play really well,allowing anyone who is watching the film to become a part of it!.Furthermore,the funny songs and the wonderful images traveled me in India and in the Indian culture!There are not specific disadvantages!Although,the title could have been either "Life of Idiots" or "Life of Rancho!" These three hours that I spent to watch this movie where the best three hours of my entire life!Maybe this movie isn't the most famous one,but for me is it is the best!In this movie "All is Well!!!"

title: The best Indian Movie of all time.
review:
It has to be the most idiotic start to such a fascinating movie. You wonder where the movie is heading to when an airplane returns to base after a passenger(R.Madhavan) suffers a heart attack in an infirm manner. But Rajkumar Hirani soon gets his act and cast together to deliver a stunning product. Education is not about success; it's about pursuing excellence and doing what you are passionate about. In the end, success will chase you. This oft-repeated dialogue is beautifully portrayed in the climax. I have never laughed so hard before leaving a theater and you surely don't feel as a fourth idiot in the theater.

Take a bow Mr Hirani. 3 IDIOTS is a fantastic film, one that every parent, teacher and most importantly students will dig into.'All Is Well', will soon be a craze across the nation. Hirani this time looks at the education system. The respectable, mechanical ways in which education is imparted where students are like machines. The setting is a prestigious engineering college and at the center of it all is Aamir Khan, a genius student who likes to see some fun injected in the lectures. Hirani touches on student suicides; parents pushing students into a field they are not interested ; students silently trying to excel in something they are not passionate about and also human emotions of how when a friend fails, you feel sad but when the same friend tops in college, jealousy takes hold. All these aspects and more are beautifully woven into the screenplay.There is a twist too, to spice up things at the interval.

To get to the story, Farhan Qureshi (R Madhavan) Raju Rastogi (Sharman Joshi) and Rancho (Aamir Khan) are three united buddies. The film starts with Farhan and Raju getting some info on Rancho who has gone missing after their graduation. It's been (5-10) years now. It then moves to flashback. Where did Rancho disappear? Who was he really and what is he up to now? These questions keep you intrigued throughout the movie.

The music by Shantanu Moitra is excellent and dialogue's by Hirani and Abhijit Joshi very inspiring. Although Hirani does not take pains to establish the friendship between the three, you overlook that fact because there is lot of meat in the screenplay. The film has been inspired from Chetan Bhagat's novel Five Point Someone. To knock off almost 20 years and pass off as a 24-year-old is a herculean task, one, which the diminutive Khan does beautifully.I mean, you do not see any persona of the Aamir of old in any angle, in any shot, in any dialogue delivery. A complete, brand new Aamir. You look for flaws but find none. Truly, a mark of a genius. The odd way in which he walks with his feet slightly apart is a delight. Sharman Joshi is excellent too. Madhavan could have taken his role more seriously and tried to fit in as a college student. Kareena, though does not have much of a role makes an impact while Mona Singh who makes her big screen debut does not get enough scope to show her talent. The one who steals the show with Aamir is Omi, the over zealous student who mugs his way to the top. This character is simply hilarious. In fact, it's a serious focus on how most students actually are today.

Boman Irani as the college head for once is not loud and over-the-top. A clever make-up and twist of the tongue is what sets him apart from his other roles, which have become monotonous.

There are many scenes that will grip you and others that will have you laughing silly. Like the last scene and the scene at Teacher's Day when Rancho changes the script.

title: Amazing
review: This movie is amazing both in the story as well as the song and dance. No clue if it's a spoiler, hence why it's checked, but this movie takes a huge unexpected twist. I absolutely love Bollywood films and this one is a must see. Aamir Khan is just an amazing actor, he really has a huge emotional range. The dancing is exceptional. The music really speaks to you! My husband hates Bollywood films but the 3 idiots song made his day. Sorry, this is my first review, so it may not be that great. The supporting actors really make everything seem so real. Thanks! If only we can do what he did in real life. Just go ahead and do anything under someone else's name with them paying! That would be a dream come true and get rid of much student debit!

title: Watched it multiple times, still entertaining
review:
I have watched this movie a lot of times and never got bored always enjoyed thoroughly. If we talk about the collections, many Bollywood movies have crossed its grossing though but, they aren't even close to its standards. Getting a 300Cr film in 2009 was not easy. Well, I know one should never judge by the collections but, sometimes when they cross a mark, indicates even the intellect audience is paying to watch it. The narration itself from Farhan's POV keeps you bonded with the movie. All the characters were so strong that you fall in love with them easily. You will only agree with me when you watch it. Simply, Raju Hirani + Aamir Khan = Masterpiece!!!
In one sentence - the best Bollywood movie ever! If you are into movies, then this one is not to be missed. The acting is incredible by the ensemble cast. The script is funny and at the same time. Even the scenery is breath-taking. Although the length of the film is pretty long and has some quirky musical numbers, 3 idiots is a delight.
It is worth the watch! I laughed! And I'm giving this a 10!

title: Entertaining but overrated
review:
3 Idiots tells the story of three college friends; Rancho, Raju and Farhan. Rancho disappears after his graduation. When after years of absence a trail to his whereabouts emerges, the two friends set out to find him. During this road trip, the origin and history of their special friendship is told.

3 idiots is a typical Bollywood production with some songs and dance choreography's. The shots are wonderful and the movie breathes an atmosphere of 'joi de vivre' and playfulness. The casting of the main characters is on point and they seem to be enjoying themselves. The central morale/message that is conveyed in the flick is universally recognizable but put on way too heavy to my taste.

I must admit that I am not a frequent viewer of the Bollywoord genre, I came across the title reviewing the IMDb top 250 and became curious because of the high rating. Although the movie certainly is worth your while, I personally feel the rating is a bit inflated

title: Aal Izz Well
review:
10 years after finishing college, the two friends Farhan & Raju go searching for Rancho; a dear friend of them, who throughout college slowly made them realize what matters in life.

Rancho mysteriously disappeared shortly after graduation, and while driving from destination to destination in their attempt to find him again, the old friends reminisce of the years they spent with him.

In a society where the highest honor in life, for women are to become doctors, and men to become engineers, we meet the freshmen students at the highly esteemed college of ICE. Students at ICE all strive to become the best of the best, by following the norms & and endless repetition of the trivia in traditional engineering.

Rancho comes to the college as a free spirit, his mind always searching for alternative solutions, and his heart always thinking of others before himself; and from the very moment he steps in the door things start to change.

on their journey, Farhad & Raju are both reminded of the countless times where Rancho helped them to improve their lives, even if they did not realize it at the moment: like when his quick thinking saved the life of Raju's father, and when he after-wards would rather miss his exams than leave his friend in the hospital alone, or in his constant challenges against the "system".

His alternative ways and desire to help everybody ultimately wins over even his old nemesis, the college director Dr. Viru: by also saving the life of his daughter and newborn grandchild.

The title, the picture on the promotional posters, and the description of the movie made me expect a, perhaps forgettable, goofy comedy; something like the "American Pie" movies (no offense meant). But boy were I in for a surprise!

The story is very well told, the music is beautifully composed, and even though I didn't understand half of the lyrics; some of the songs are still imprinted in my long-term memory.

There are certain comedic aspects to consider, but what really stands out as my main impression of this movie; is how deep it manages to touch the subjects of social acceptance & friendship.

Well thought, deep & moving.

(The thing holding me back from rating this 10/10, are primarily some of the more goofy scenes, where you, for a moment, are ripped away from the thoughtfulness of the movie, and forced to watch an e.g. "highschool-musical" shower song)

But still: Aal Izz Well.

He changed the way to learn in many students. Also, it inspired that a person should go in the field which is his hobby. Also we should not believe in superstitions. All actors were wonderful.
